attributes.action: Ban Homosexual Books And Content For Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition about banning childrens content that contain homosexuality.

Children should not be taught about sex or homesexuality.

A book I read that my little sister got from the library promoting homosexuality.

The book states that it is about penguin-lovers, meaning people who love penguins, but it clearly is not about this. The main story is about homosexuality, they just use penguins to cover up the truth. This is very crafty and misleading to children.

I am not homophobic, I don't really care what people do with their lives. Every person has their own choices in life, but please keep it to yourselves and don't brainwash other people or children.

If homosexual people want to publish books out like this then do it with adult books in the homosexual section of a library or bookstore not childrens books.

Children should not be exposed to these types of content.

Book details:

Title: And Tango Makes Three
Publisher: Simon & Schuster
Authors: Justin Richardson, Peter Parnell

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
